DOC.brief_title: Single-step Versus Sequential Media Preimplantation Embryo Development Pregnancy Rates
DOC.detailed_description: Sequential culture medium introduce order meet changing requirement develop embryo vitro . However , renew interest use single-step medium , allow embryo choose necessary nutrient maintain stable culture environment . Previous study suggest sequential medium appear superior single-step medium . The current study include 2 RCTs : RCT 1 : Random allocation sibling oocyte compare embryo development blastocyst formation rate two culture medium compare . RCT2 : Random allocation patient either Global Origio medium , evaluate pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: < 40 year age female infertility patient least 10 retrieve oocyte 41 year old frozenthawed oocytes/embryos oocyte donation cycle
